content: bowen shawl 2025 by petra breakstone the comfy understated bowen shawl is such a lovely knit and to wear it is simply fabulous knitted mostly in garter stitch except for the bottom border which is done with a simple knit and purl stitch pattern creating not only a color contrast but also a lovely break and interest the unblocked shawl measures 99 in length and 17 5 in height the pattern is entirely written yarn abbreviations 3 easy care dk yarn cakes in as many colors c1 2 3 - color 1 2 3 272 yards/100 grams a cake in a super soft co - cast on washable acrylic yarn 3 cakes used one k - knit each as shown in colors… kfb - knit in front and back of same stitch c1-marine c2-silver c3- charcoal kyok - knit 1 yarn over knit into the same knit kits at https /yarnz2go myshopify com/ stitch + 2 stitches p - purl pk - purl into next stitch and knit into the back loop of same stitch +1 stitch notions repeat - repeat rs - right/knit side us size 10 6 mm circular needle 40 91 cm sl - slip in length st s - stitch es tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing ws - wrong/purl side yo - yarn over techniques knitting purling changing colors increasing gauge binding off weaving in ends blocking is 12 sts and 26 row in 4 of garter stitch optional my sample was not blocked counting 13 ridges © petra breakstone enjoy the knit page 1 of 2 bowen shawl 2025 by petra breakstone part 1 getting started bottom border first increase see pk explanation in abbreviations with c1- co 19 sts i used the loose quick and a total of 20 repeats worked in c3 easy loop method row 1 rs sl1 k11 pk repeat to last st then k6 kfb -7 times k6 26 sts k1 262 sts row 2 ws sl1 p12 k1 repeat to last 12 p11 k1 row 3 sl1 k11 p1 repeat to last st k1 this is how you work the increased stripes row 4 as row 2 pay attention to c1 and c2 used repeat row 3 and 4 3 more times row 1 k2 kyok k to last 3 sts kyok k2 +4 row 2 k2 yo k to last 2 sts yo k2 +2 bottom border second increase c3 row 1 rs sl1 k12 pk repeat in stitch working 2 row stripes in increase method pattern to end 282 sts row 2 ws sl1 p13 k1 repeat in stitch c1 - work row 1 and 2 1 time +6 sts pattern to end c2 - work row 1 and 2 1 time +6 sts row 3 sl1 k to first p st k1 p13 k1 repeat in st pattern to end repeat the 2 row sequence in two colors row 4 as row 2 9 more times for a total of 10 times worked in
